com.nutiteq.geometry
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement
      com.nutiteq.geometry.Text

public class Text
extends VectorElement

Text to be shown on the map at specific location.

Constructor Detail

Text

public Text(MapPos mapPos,
            java.lang.String text,
            TextStyle textStyle,
            java.lang.Object userData)
Default constructor (can be used if single style is sufficient for all zoom levels).

Parameters:
mapPos - position of the text element. Position is defined in the coordinate system of the layer this element is attached to.
text - the text to display on the map.
textStyle - style to use for displaying the text (font, size, color, etc).
userData - custom user data associated with the element.

Text

public Text(MapPos mapPos,
            java.lang.String text,
            StyleSet<TextStyle> styles,
            java.lang.Object userData)
Constructor for text if text style depends on zoom level.

Parameters:
mapPos - position of the text element. Position is defined in the coordinate system of the layer this element is attached to.
text - the text to display on the map.
styles - style set to use for displaying the text.
userData - custom user data associated with the element.
Method Detail

getMapPos

public MapPos getMapPos()
Get the position of the text.

Returns:
position of the text.

getText

public java.lang.String getText()
Get the text associated with this element.

Returns:
the text specified in the constructor.

setActiveStyle

public void setActiveStyle(int zoom)
Description copied from class: VectorElement
This method is intended for vector layers - it will update element internal state based on zoom level.

Overrides:
setActiveStyle in class VectorElement

clearActiveStyle

public void clearActiveStyle()
This method is intended for vector layers - it will clean up internal state when element is not visible.
